name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
title: Neuvillette: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
in_play_description: After your characters trigger Hydro-Related Reactions: Neuvillette, who has this card equipped, deals +1 DMG for the next 2 instances.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Neuvillette to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Neuvillette, equip this card. After Neuvillette equips this card, immediately use As Water Seeks Equilibrium once. After your characters trigger Hydro-Related Reactions: Neuvillette, who has this card equipped, deals +1 DMG for the next 2 instances. (You must have Neuvillette in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
